file_content.text: Shouldn't you be fighting Imperials somewhere?
Do I look like an Imperial-infested dam to you?
Try to hold on, Tav. The Jedi will be here soon, and then you can rest.
The next time I see you, we'd better be in Camp Sovereign.
Not soon... not soon enough.
There you are. Be quick, but gentle. Don't ask about the other scouts, or anything else that might upset him.
I know how much you value your patients' lives. You did excellent work today.
Thank you for this.
Looks like he's in bad shape. What did the Imperials do to him?
What happened?
This man has critical intel on Camp Sovereign. I can't worry about upsetting him.
I'll ask what I like.
Worry about upsetting me, then.
Blight's men call 'em "the Seekers." Giant electrical towers, converted to weapons. Instantly vaporizes their targets.
Colonel Blight will answer for his crimes. Is there anything else?
Blight won't stop us.
Doesn't seem like the most efficient place for his work. Do you think he's on to us?
Why is he there?
Guess we can shelve this plan. Blight's probably wiped the prisoners out already.
The camp's doomed.
If these Seekers vaporize people, how are you still here?
But you survived.
I've never encountered technology like that before. How does it work?
The Seekers?
Sounds like I need to take out the Seekers before the Protectors can land.
That's good intel.
Could the Jedi and I have a moment alone, please?
T7 = wait outside // T7 = prep for Camp Sovereign assault!
This better be important. Platonically important.
Aww, you two are... not even gonna jinx it.
She's all yours, pal.
Do I have to? All right, all right, I'm going.
I'll just wait outside. Sir.
We have a difficult battle ahead. Don't exhaust yourself.
Reassurance: I will be only six-point-five seconds away, master. My weapon will be charged.
Certainly, mistress. Please, take as much time as you need!
If you take a partial hit, this should ease the pain. If it's a direct hit... avoid that. I'd like you to come back.
What would I get if I called you pretty? A vaccination?
[Flirt] What an odd gift.
If this gift means something, I'd like to find out what.
[Flirt] So you do care?
Well, it's not flowers or candy, but I'll take it.
[Flirt] What an odd gift.
Survive this and maybe you'll see some.
I'm not interested in you.
Well... don't stand there staring at me! You've got a camp to invade. Go!
If he has to die, he's going to do it in peace. You've got all the intel you need. Get going.
Bantha slop. More kolto.
He's still going to die. Nothing "excellent" about it.
I doubt you're interested in the clinical answer.
Tav, the Jedi's here. Just relax, and tell as much as you remember.
They've got guards, artillery, droids, standard defenses. We tried to get close, but they fired on us....
When you find Blight... give him what he deserves.
Doesn't matter. He'd keep killing us either way....
There's still time. Would have done it by now, if he was planning on it....
I'm no engineer. You'll have to ask Blight.
Didn't take a direct hit. Just next to someone who did.
It means I like you. You can have that one for free.
Call me "pretty" sometime and find out.
I'm sorry--I should have made this clear. I'm with Kira. Permanently.
Audra, this is very sweet, but Doc and I are... he's my chief medic.
I'm sorry, Doctor. A Jedi has no attachments.
I see. Can't blame a girl for trying, right?
Are you insane? Those fighters will be here any minute!
We had no warning... but you've got the Force. Move fast, hit the Seeker operators first, and you should make it.
Then there's Blight himself. Spotted him heading for the camp's command center... probably counting up the dead....
Before you go... I have something for you. It's a salve I created, after seeing Tav's wounds.
Sure. I'll be out there, not eavesdropping.
You know she's going back to the ship with me, right?
Follow the Protectors. I'll catch up with you once these prisoners recover.
